context: Could you recommend a movie by David Ayer? I like him.
David Ayer wrote Harsh Times starring J.K. Simmons. HE also wrote End Of Watch starring Anna Kendrick. Have you seen those?
Yes, I loved J.K. Simmons in it! He was also very good in Megamind.
resp: Megamind was written by Tom McGrath and Arthur C. Clarke. Are you familiar with these writers?
